snippet: The Cuban authorities detained the dissident blogger Yoani Sánchez for 30 hours before releasing her late Friday.
abstract: Cuban authorities detain dissident blogger Yoani Sanchez for 30 hours before releasing her; Sanchez was scheduled to cover trial of Spanish politician Angel Carromero, who is charged in connection with deaths of two dissidents in a car crash.
lead_paragraph: The Cuban authorities detained the dissident blogger Yoani Sánchez for 30 hours before releasing her late Friday.

headline.main: Cuba: Blogger Detained as Trial Begins
headline.print_headline: Cuba: Blogger Detained as Trial Begins
